@graph.name: MD protein-ligand workflow (from PDB structure)

High Throughput Molecular Dynamics and Analysis

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [High Throughput Molecular Dynamics and Analysis](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/computational-chemistry/tutorials/htmd-analysis/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
